Hoist expressions out of the specified loop.

Note, alias info for inner loop is not preserved so it is not a good idea to run LICM multiple times on one loop.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/licm-cpp/#l00220">220</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/licm-cpp">LICM.cpp</a>.
